title: Start a FARM in your BACKYARD | Small Scale Regenerative Farming with Nature's Always Right

tasks.task: Hosting and interviewing a farmer on camera.
subtasks: Setting up the filming environment (kitchen table).
Discussing the farmer's background and experience.
Showing the farmer's property and setup.
Explaining farm operations and equipment (chicken coop, worm system).
Discussing health journey that led to farming.
Highlighting crop management techniques and profitability.
Sharing future plans and moving to Tennessee.
Encouraging viewers to pursue their dreams.
Expressing excitement for the farmer's move.
Answering a viewer's comment about grass.
Addressing a mistake or issue (grass) before departure.
Wrapping up and concluding the video.
